title: Embedding Fonts in Flash CS3 using AS3 and CSS
content:
Can anyone point me in the right direction of how to embed fonts in Flash CS3, while using Actionscript 3.0 and CSS to manipulate formatting of the text in a given dynamic field?

I sort of achieved what I was looking for using AS2 but I also didn’t embed the fonts that the CSS styles are made up of. I can’t even imagine how the CSS will be able to tell Flash what embedded typeface to use (via “font-family”?). Does this even make sense?

Should I upload an example?  
I’m interested in having two or more typefaces that are embedded, show up on a single line together, oppose to separate text fields.

(I wish typography was easier in Flash...)

=[

anything helps | thnx guys! =)
author: idrissofny

comments.content: Go to your library and embed the fonts. You can also choose a name there (“MyFont”). Once the font are embedded you can call them dynamically using HTML in your text field.
